conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a clean isometric cutaway of the 2D floor plan with clear volume and wall thickness.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection with consistent wall heights and clear interior volumes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. Wall positions, room counts, and proportions align perfectly with the source 2D drawing.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is very accurate; small details like the plants and kitchen appliances are faithfully recreated.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no artifacts. Lighting is uniform. Use of doors/windows is highly readable.

detected_errors.description: Minor door wing direction variations compared to 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains architectural proportions and furniture placement with high geometric clarity.
